comment: Tasting this almost a year later from a large bottle.  Delicious.  Going to brew this again next weekend if I can get my hands on some Clausenii.  I noticed that it take s LONG time for Clausenii to get good.  Definite stone aroma that is acceptable when tasting because of the slight sour peach complement it.  Mouthfeel is great, tiny prickly carbonation.  Love this beer.
